content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully created by the agent during these steps. Although the agent repeatedly attempted to place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5), none were actually placed due to resource and inventory shortages. Other operations (such as using furnaces for smelting) referenced existing game entities rather than newly built structures.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Issues with get_entities  
 – When retrieving entities, ensure that the function is invoked according to its correct signature. Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or providing positional arguments that do not match the function’s definition.  
 – If the call returns None, safeguard the code by converting None to an empty list before attempting any iteration.

• Lab Crafting and Placement Errors  
 – Confirm that the required sub-ingredients (e.g. iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, copper cables) and base materials (iron-plate, copper-plate) are available before attempting to craft a Lab.  
 – Verify that a Lab is present in the inventory prior to placement to prevent placement errors due to absence of the item.
